website_summaries.verdict: A combination of stainless steel cutters and plastic holders make this cookie cutter set safe and easy to handle. A solid choice for little ones who love to help out.
pros: Kid-safe design features chunky food grade plastic handles and sturdy stainless steel cutters
Cuts smoothly through dough, sandwiches, fruit, and vegetables
Comes with a variety of fun shapes in different sizes
Cleaning brush and wooden push stick are handy extras
cons: A handful of owners felt they were too small for everyday baking

customer_reviews.title: Push-out stick, easy to push out the shapes
customer_reviews.text: The material is great, 304 food grade stainless steel, used for several times, not rusted yet. What surprised me is that it came with a push-out stick. When the shapes get stuck inside, I just push it with the wood stick from the hole on the top and no need to take off the green holder. Also the small brush is easy to clean the cutters. Interesting shapes and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun shapes to add for kids food
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my picky eaters and it is a great way to add some fruits and vegetables to their lunch. They are enjoying the fun shapes. I use them for sandwiches and bread too. They are easy to use and clean. The green plastic cover prevents any cuttings on hand. It comes with a pusher and brush. Great set
customer_reviews.author: A. SINGH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small dog treats
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4lb teacup poodle. I wanted to make some homemade treats for him, but all of the "dog treat" cookie cutters made treats that were way too big for his tiny mouth. I saw these when I was searching and the smaller size is perfect for his treats!! I purchased this set with both sizes because I hope to need the larger size for snacks for my children in a few years. They are very easy to clean and use! The tiny brush is perfect for the nooks and crannies of the more intricate cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Numb3rs Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these! They are so much fun, and super easy to use. I found it easier for me to use a smaller hot pad to push down on carrots. I think it may be because I have hand problems ( arthritis ) just starting. Use these to make my lunch alot more fun, and made a veggie soup using these, everyone was delighted! Lots of compliments on how much fun it made dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy King

customer_reviews.title: One already broke - but still a good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are OK, one already came loose from the green handle, but still usable, just have to push it back in. I am assuming these will rust at some point even with hand washing. Too small for sandwiches, I have tried to make pb&j bites, but the top piece of bread tears every time, no matter how fast or slow i press it. Fun for Lunch meat and cheese. My little one loves ham hearts!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product but useless top caps.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for making fun kids shaped snacks. Easy for lil hands too. My only complaint would be the green caps. I would of preferred they all come with their own cap as some shapes are hard to remove from it (like the star) and I find it the don’t stay on all of them. So we’ve been using without the cap which impacts their durability. Otherwise they’re great. I appreciate the cleaning scrubber and the tool that allows you to push your dough out of the cutter.
customer_reviews.author: MirandaK

customer_reviews.title: these were the hit of the party
customer_reviews.text: i made a watermelon fruit basket for a childs party with these and they were a hit! the small sizes make perfect child size bites and the larger ones are perfect for adults. i used the larger ones for cheese. super easy to use and easy to clean. the rubber pieces keep them from hurting your hand. i'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cynlis

customer_reviews.title: Gets the kids to eat more veggies
customer_reviews.text: This are great to cut up cucumbers, apples, fruit etc. my kids eat more fresh veggies and fruit with these cute shapes. Also super fun for having people over, just adds a cute personal touch to finger foods
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun way of preparing foods!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fun to use. My wife started using this to make fun baby food patterns. The star and heart shape is baby's favorite.
customer_reviews.author: kf

customer_reviews.title: Cute cutter set
customer_reviews.text: This was a good product for the price. Durable and well made. Perfect for cutting veggies and cheese into cute shapes for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of fun for cutting cheese, vegetables, sandwich bits and cookies. Very easy to clean. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like these, I cut veggies in different shapes to encourage them to eat healthy. I have used it for cucumbers and carrots this week.
customer_reviews.author: Joi H

customer_reviews.title: Creative snacks
customer_reviews.text: Bought to get creative with my daughters snacks and have used for other little food projects, etc. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: J. Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Now that my daughter is home during all the school closures, I’m trying to find ways to make lunch not so boring. I’ve loved it so far. Great product for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blackroze67

customer_reviews.title: these are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: got these to cut out vegetable for my little one's lunch. the shapes come out beautiful and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Completely unnecessary for me, which makes it even better. Who doesn’t love some heart shaped cucumbers on their salad?! I love these so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of cutters! They are exactly what I wanted! They are made well and clean up easily. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Ash EP

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Use these very frequently to cut fruit for childs lunch. These have stood up to very frequent use. Cuts very clear shapes. Well thought out product.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this!! They work on fruit, veggies, cookie dough and pastry dough!! Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: betty blaylock

customer_reviews.title: Great to cut shapes into anything!
customer_reviews.text: Love the 2 different sized shapes. Easy to clean, arrived quickly, sturdy, cant wait to use when making my LO food
customer_reviews.author: jessee

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo cute! However none of them are big enough to cut sandwiches. Like at all. So beware if that’s why you want them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little things! Great for cutting fruit and veggies for a toddler. They work great and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love them as much as my kids do!
customer_reviews.text: Makes food more fun! Great set. Only wish is that they came in a little box, but I put them in a tupperware.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon M Larson

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cutters! All different sizes and shapes. Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Variety of Shapes
customer_reviews.text: The variety of shapes is great. I liked that these are tall, so you can do appetizers with veggies, meats and cheeses. Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rohlfs

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: Even the big ones are small , but it’s good made
customer_reviews.author: Ahlam swd

customer_reviews.title: You've got what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I can use it on fruit, potatos, cookie.. but it's not easy to clean. But it's good on overall.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Cutters
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift , they gave a good Review of the items
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute and so easy to use , I used them to cut sandwiches for my son and cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em
customer_reviews.text: These are great, they work really well for cutting shapes out of fruits and vegetables to make meals more fun for little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the small heart cutter so far but these are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: nicolle lorengo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These cutters work great. I am using them to get my kids to eat different foods.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Urlaub

customer_reviews.title: Missing items in the box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of the 18 piece from this item and what I receive is one box 18 pieces and another box of 13 pieces total rip-off.items missing
customer_reviews.author: Rasha Marafi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love, love the bright colors for my online shows
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McGill

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids will love these!
customer_reviews.text: The cutters arrived quickly and were as described in the ad. They are sturdy so they should hold up very well to my grandkids (both toddlers). They will be easy to clean as the tighter corners aren't too tight so as to be able to reach with cleaning utensils. It helps that a brush was included in the package. I love that each cutter has its own "handle" to protect little fingers. My grandkids are going to love using these this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Complete set and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a set of cutters that are ideal for me as I like to make garnishes and this takes a lot of work out of it. They’re easy to use even on raw carrots. I like that I pusher is included to poke the item out of the cutter. This is well thought out. Kudos to the designers.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Architect

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and not as many as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product came with 16 pieces j stead of the advertised 18 and a bunch of the green protective tops are missing. I’m sure they still work as they are just cookie cutters but disappointed they didn’t all have the green protective tops for when you push them when cutting
customer_reviews.author: Keren Carter

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Unless you’re making something with quarter or dime size shapes you want to get a different set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuynature

customer_reviews.title: Fun for lunch
customer_reviews.text: The kids love having fruits, cheese and meat cut in fun shapes! Their friends are always excited to see what they have for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: JW777

customer_reviews.title: Makes cute pot luck
customer_reviews.text: Used these to cut watermelon, cantaloupe, honeydew melons into cute bite size bits. Made big hit at party.
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow Smith

customer_reviews.title: To small for what I wanted them for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them to use to make tea sandwiches but they are just too small. However, I experimented with them using cucumbers and they worked well, but I haven't found anything else they work well with. Had they been larger, I would have given them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DEMI

customer_reviews.title: So cute and easy.
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and easy to use. I was able to get them in time to make cute little snacks for my daughters school to celebrate her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Vior

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These are good. I think the bigger ones are most useful, but they all cut well and are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, quality cutters. Using mostly for everything except cookies! Cuts nicely through vegetables and cheeses.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M

customer_reviews.title: Cheap avoid
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest of all cheap. All shapes were distorted right out the box
customer_reviews.author: Sejin Park

customer_reviews.title: Making food fun
customer_reviews.text: This makes decorating food so fun for my 2 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Cynna Isla

product_meta.title: Gimars 8 pcs cookie-cutters
feature_bullets: None rusting material 18/8 stainless steel to cut safe food - High quality package of food grade 18/8 stainless steel, and plastic silica gel material, not contain BPA. This fruit shape cutter is built to last for a long time and does not rust after cleaning. Sturdy and sharp to cut food shapes.
